text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the triangle $OCB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the triangle $OCB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BO$ is $35$ units.
The length of the line $OA$ is $25$ units.
The length of the line $CA$ is $23$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $11$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
The line $OA$ is perpendicular to the line $AC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BC$, forming a triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $OA$, $OB$, $OC$, connecting the point $O$ to the vertices of the triangle $ABC$.
